summary: AN ORDINANCE accepting electrical underground distribution easements over portions of Maple Leaf Addition to Green Lake Circle; northwest quarter of Section II, Township 25 North, Range 4 East, W.M.; vacated Auburn Place East: Lago Vista; Lake Forest Waterfront Addition; Haller Lake Tracts; Victory Heights; and Meridan Avenue Acres, as described below and placing easements under the jurisdiction of the City Light Department.
